1.4.1.name: wordpress/simple-slides
1.4.1.description:
Simple Slides in undergoing big updates, version 2.0 will be out soon!

Create slideshows that uses the world's most awesome slider, the Nivo Slider. Uses shortcodes with a number of attributes to allow customized embedding in widgets, posts, pages, or theme files. Supports the following browsers: Internet Explorer v7+, Firefox v3+, Google Chrome v4+, Safari v4+, and Opera v10+. Please don't hesitate to contact us for questions, suggestions, etc. For more information check the plugin documentation.
